name: Ride on the boat thru the Bangkok river and canals to see the life along the river, passing charming China Town narrow streets end up in traditional Mookata thai grill with local friends
description: I'll show you how I see Bangkok myself, a city built on the river and the life around, I will show you charm of narrow streets in the old Chinatown, then we ride a boat along the Chao Praya river, past temples and palaces , along with my Thai friends and family we'll go into a traditional Moo-kata restaurant in Pin Klao (Thai style all you can eat barbecue ). After all, we can enjoy a drink with a nighttime atmosphere in a small club with live music on the Pra athid road, the old part of Bangkok.
